name: Block Puzzle King
description:
Block puzzle is a puzzle game to fill the empty space using of blocks

[Features]
- Six kinds of different game modes. Spin,double,tricks,etc
- Easy to learn how to play the game
- Consists of 3000 steps and supports a step-by-step difficulty
- Support your ranking, accomplishment, and multiplay
- Support all tablet devices
- Multiplayer Support
- fun game, free game, no wifi, no internet
